message.content: Write a poem about Thai green curry. First, do a web search to understand the most common adjectives used to describe Thai green curry (flavors, textures, colors, aromas, etc.). Use what you learn to craft a vivid, evocative poem that captures the essence of this dish.

input.query: Thai green curry adjectives describe flavors textures aromas characteristics

Unlocking Authentic — Formosa Asian Market","url":"https://www.formosamarket.com/blogs/news/what-are-the-key-ingredients-in-thai-green-curry-unlocking-authentic-flavors"},{"title":"Thai Curry Spice Differences: Red, Green and Yellow | Rosa's Thai","url":"https://rosasthai.com/news-and-events/thai-curry-spice-differences"}]

Based on the search results, here's a comprehensive overview of the adjectives and descriptors used to characterize Thai green curry:

## Flavor Profile Adjectives

Thai green curry is known for its **fresh, herbaceous flavor**.(no content)The flavor profile is described as **aromatic and rich**.(no content)It delivers **bold, zesty flavors** and a **fiery kick**.(no content)Thai green curry achieves its signature blend of **spicy, savory, and subtly sweet** notes.(no content)The dish is beloved for its **balance of heat and sweetness**.(no content)Green curry appears to have a **more decadent taste** than other Thai curries.(no content)Although the spiciness varies, it tends to be **more pungent** than the milder red curries.

## Heat Level

Thai green curry is the **spiciest** of the three main Thai curries. Its vibrant green color comes from fresh green chilies, which pack a punch.(no content)It uses predominantly **hot Bird's eye chilies** which are hotter than many other varieties.(no content)Because the green curry paste is made with green chilis, it is **far hotter** than other curries.

## Aroma Characteristics

The vibrant hue of green curry is derived from green chilies, Thai basil, and kaffir lime leaves, which infuse the dish with a **distinctively aromatic and fragrant quality**.(no content)Adding coconut milk to the mix produces an **amazing aroma** that will tantalize your taste buds.(no content)Thai basil offers a **sweet, anise-like flavor with hints of licorice**, while kaffir lime leaves infuse the dish with a **distinctive citrusy fragrance**.

## Texture Descriptors

Green curry often has a **creamy texture** due to the addition of coconut milk.(no content)As a Thai curry based on coconut milk and fresh green chilies, the color comes out **creamy mild green**.(no content)Coconut milk creates a **rich, creamy base** for the curry.

## Color Descriptors

Thai green curry has a **striking green color** and **vibrant hue**.(no content)Green curry is **bright and herby** from fresh cilantro root and makrut lime leaves.(no content)Over the years, the green sauce has become even **more vibrant**.

## Additional Descriptors

Fresh herbs like green chilies, lemongrass, fish sauce, garlic, ginger, and shallots create that **distinctive, flavorful punch**.(no content)Green curry is described as **moderately spiced** and one of the **most versatile** curry types.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

content.text:
Now I have a rich understanding of Thai green curry's characteristics. Let me craft a vivid poem that captures its essence.

---

# Thai Green Curry

In the mortar's ancient hollow,
green chilies meet their fate,
Bird's eye fire and galangal
ground to fragrant paste.

Lemongrass whispers citrus secrets,
kaffir lime leaves unfurl,
their zesty perfume rising
like incense through the world.

Coconut milk pours creamy white,
a river rich and sweet,
dissolving emerald fury
into something bittersweet.

Thai basil, bold with licorice,
swims in the verdant tide,
while jasmine rice awaits below
like pillows opened wide.

The broth is bright and herbaceous,
vibrant as a jungle glade,
where fiery heat and sweetness
dance in careful trade.

First sip: the tongue awakens,
a pungent, zesty sting,
then creaminess embraces
like a gentle, soothing thing.

The aroma fills the kitchen,
tantalizing, warm, and deep,
a fragrant invitation
that no mortal tongue could keep.

Balanced on a razor's edge
of savory and sweet,
Thai green curry conquers
all who dare to eat.

So lift your spoon in reverence
to this emerald delight,
where bold and decadent flavors
burn gloriously bright.

---

This poem draws on the most common descriptors for Thai green curry: its **fiery heat** from Bird's eye chilies, its **creamy texture** from coconut milk, the **herbaceous and citrusy aromas** of lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, and Thai basil, and the characteristic **vibrant green color**. It also captures the essential balance of **spicy, sweet, and savory** that defines this beloved dish.

Sources:
- [Green curry - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_curry)
- [What's the Difference Between Thai Red, Yellow, and Green Curries? - Formosa Asian Market](https://www.formosamarket.com/blogs/news/whats-the-difference-between-thai-red-yellow-and-green-curries-a-flavorful-comparison)
- [Types of Thai Curries - Nittaya Thai Curry](https://www.nittayathaicurry.com/articles/types-of-thai-curries-understanding-the-difference/)
- [Thai Curry Spice Differences - Rosa's Thai](https://rosasthai.com/news-and-events/thai-curry-spice-differences)
- [The Ultimate Guide to Thai Curries - Inquiring Chef](https://inquiringchef.com/the-ultimate-guide-to-thai-curries/)
- [What Are the Key Ingredients in Thai Green Curry? - Formosa Asian Market](https://www.formosamarket.com/blogs/news/what-are-the-key-ingredients-in-thai-green-curry-unlocking-authentic-flavors)
